definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Bud film contract and leaf long, lozenge or wedge, have notch shape a tooth-like part of anything.
sentences.chinese: 苞片約與花瓣等長，菱形或楔形，具缺刻狀齒。

sentences.english: A whorl of bracts subtending a flower or flower cluster.
sentences.chinese: 包被花或花簇的一輪苞片。
苞片和花萼星狀氈毛狀。

sentences.english: The flowers, or bracts, have 4 petals in a cross pattern.
sentences.chinese: 鮮花，或苞片，有4個花瓣在跨模式。

sentences.english: Flowers and bracts fused laterally to form a syncarp.
sentences.chinese: 花和苞片側面癒合形成一合心皮果。

sentences.english: From the next winter, only rain can induce opening.
sentences.chinese: 在下一個冬季，只有雨水能夠使苞片張開。

sentences.english: Each lamina of ramose top turns into bud piece, base the ministry is gules, read floweriness piece.
sentences.chinese: 各分枝頂端的葉片變爲苞片，基部紅色，看似花瓣。
